programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui Robert Shaye - Director Robert Shaye - Director.

programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. She offers him a generous business deal - to oversee a spectacular dance show at The Rattigan theatre in London. Comedy, starring Channing Tatum and Salma Hayek Steven Soderbergh - Director Channing Tatum - Mike Lane Salma Hayek - Maxandra Mendoza Caitlin Gerard - Kim Gavin Spokes - Matthew Nancy Carroll - Phoebe.

programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honour Among Thieves
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Comedy, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, lute-playing bard Edgin abandons a noble pledge and turns to petty thievery with his surrogate sister, exiled barbarian Holga. The duo recruit self-doubting sorcerer Simon and incorrigible rogue Forge to their merry gang. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Unlucky US assassin Ladybug is given a simple mission - retrieve a metal briefcase on a high-speed train departing from Tokyo. The pick-up is too easy, and Ladybug, together with other killers, soon discover their missions have something in common. programme.sub-title: Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Crime/detective ║ 2013 ║ 15
programme.desc: Futuristic horror thriller starring Ethan Hawke and Lena Headey. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. During a bank heist, Danny discovers a photo of his daughter with an instruction to find someone called Dell Rayne. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. programme.title: The Cinema List: Oscar Winners
programme.desc: Count down to the 96th Academy Awards as we count up from a film that has won one Oscar, to two, to three and all the way to eleven wins.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: Desperation Road
programme.desc: In Mississippi, a mother and her child are caught in a crossfire as alcohol, guns and revenge clash. Thriller based on Michael Farris Smith's namesake novel, starring Garrett Hedlund, Willa Fitzgerald and Mel Gibson Nadine Crocker - Director Garrett Hedlund - Russell Grimes Willa Fitzgerald - Maben Mel Gibson - Mitchell Ryan Hurst - Larry Michael Aaron Milligan - Walt Kat Foster - Dana Shiloh Fernandez - Clint.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mother's new boyfriend. Thriller, starring Odeya Rush, Eric Dane, Saffron Burrows and Ray Liotta in one of his final films John Barr - Director Odeya Rush - Rose Eric Dane - Derek Stipes Saffron Burrows - Alma Ray Liotta - The Captain Sala Baker - John.

programme.title: Dashcam
programme.desc: Annie Hardy, a controversial internet personality and musician, live streams from her car. She and a friend embark on a horror-fuelled road trip, and broadcast the most terrifying night of their lives. Thriller, starring Annie Hardy, Amar Chadha-Patel and Angela Enahoro Rob Savage - Director Annie Hardy - Annie Hardy Amar Chadha-Patel - Stretch Angela Enahoro - Angela Seylan Baxter - Seylan James Swanton - The Parasite.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sister's death. Thriller, starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman Rusty Cundieff - Director Josh Hutcherson - Franklin Fox Morgan Freeman - Anton Burrell Greg Germann - Sig Thorenson Lovie Simone - Jala Bevin Bru - Renee Renzler Sammi Rotibi - Calvert.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is attempting to live an honest and quiet life, but when Big Cat forces him back into her services, he proves capable of anything to protect the town and the only family he has left. programme.title: Knights of the Zodiac
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Sci Fi, Animation ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: When a goddess of war reincarnates into the body of a young girl, a street orphan discovers that he is destined to protect her. Fantasy drama, starring Sean Bean, Mackenyu, Famke Janssen and Madison Iseman Tomasz Baginski - Director Mackenyu - Seiya Famke Janssen - Vander Guraad Madison Iseman - Sienna Sean Bean - Alman Kido Diego Tinoco - Nero / Phoenix Mark Dacascos - Mylock Nick Stahl - Cassios.

programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Children's, Animation, Comedy, Family ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Kind-hearted village artist Lucas travels deep into the enchanted forest to locate a tree that bears a special insignia. In this realm of magic and wonder, Lucas locks eyes with inquisitive nymph Mavka, who yearns to rebuild bridges between the human and spirit worlds. programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and fellow Impossible Missions Force operatives Benji Dunn and Luther Stickell race to acquire two halves of an interlocking 3D key that can regain control of a lethal artificial intelligence. Opportunistic thief Grace unwittingly picks a pocket and becomes entangled in the globe-trotting caper. programme.desc: Count down to the 96th Academy Awards as we count up from a film that has won one Oscar, to two, to three and all the way to eleven wins.

programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Children's, Family ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. A failed prom proposal culminates in Ruby plunging into the sea, and finally she discovers she is destined to inherit the throne from her kraken grandmother. programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Children's, Family ║ 2023 ║ PG

programme.title: The Cinema List: Oscar Winners
programme.desc: Count down to the 96th Academy Awards as we count up from a film that has won one Oscar, to two, to three and all the way to eleven wins.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: L'immensita
